Module JBubbleBobble2
Package BubbleBobble.model

Class Collidable

java.lang.Object
BubbleBobble.model.Collidable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apple, Banana, FireIcon, Fruit, Hero, Monster, Platform, Projectile
public abstract class Collidable extends Object
The Collidable class is the superclass for all "collidable" objects in the game. Collidables are affected by gravity and store information about their location, graphics, and current state. Collidables can move around on screen and collide with each other.

  • Constructor Details

    • Collidable

      public Collidable(Level level, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Constructs a new Collidable object with the specified level, position, and size.
      Parameters:
      level - The level the object is part of.
      x - The X-coordinate of the object's position.
      y - The Y-coordinate of the object's position.
      width - The width of the object.
      height - The height of the object.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g)
      Draws the collidable onto the given graphics object.
      Parameters:
      g - is graphics object

    • getShape

      public Rectangle2D getShape()

    • changePause

      public void changePause()

    • die

      public void die()

    • collideWithPlatform

      public void collideWithPlatform(Platform p)
      For use by character-like collidables (i.e. Hero, Monster, etc.). Detects top, right, and left collisions with platform objects.
      Parameters:
      p - is Platform object

    • updatePosition

      public abstract void updatePosition()
      Abstract method for updating the position of the collidable object. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define specific movement logic.

    • addToList

      public abstract void addToList()
      Abstract method for adding the collidable object to the level's list of objects. This method should be implemented by subclasses to properly register the object.
